nodes.oneHundredTitle: Powerful and capable, excellent for small events.
nodes.twoHundredTitle: 3D complexity, perfect for large branded activations.
nodes.threeHundredTitle: Premium resolution and guaranteed to amaze.

children.text: We offer pre-designed stock shows in both our 100 and 200 drone package options. These shows are designed to fit a wide variety of events, and deliver a memorable experience that will last a lifetime.
Firefly also offers full and partial custom drone light shows. Custom shows are an incredible tool for brands, and any of our stock shows can be partially customized around your event.
If you’d like to learn more about our full custom process from design to production, click the link below for a recent case study.
Our most popular package. Perfect for small events with an audience of up to a thousand people, or venues with space constraints.
With formations stretching up to 500ft across, this package delivers a powerful display at a budget friendly level.
This package allows for beautiful 2D imagery, simple logos, and shorter words up to 10 characters in length.
“A massive, breathtaking display guaranteed to amaze your audience. Perfect for medium-high levels of design detail, 3D shapes and complex logos or icons.
This higher quantity of drones provides the ultimate creative flexibility and design capabilities.
Experiential storytelling has never been more effective.
The ultimate drone light show, specifically designed for massive branded experiences and events with large audiences.
With an unprecedented level of intricacy and resolution, this is the future of entertainment and advertising.
This activation will live beyond the event, and make waves through digital media
